channel.title: Free runescape clones
channel.description: Are their any runescape clones on here, w/ all quests and everything, just w/ free membership(since it's illegal to charge)?

item.title: Free runescape clones

item.description:

Who said Jagex staff didn’t use Java language to code RSC+RS2. :eek:

item.title: Free runescape clones
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

[quote=“llambo, post:7, topic:84498”][quote author=slomifier link=topic=124037.msg1213233#msg1213233 date=1177476475]
There is no “actual scripts”. RS doesnt use java, they made up there own language. (Pretty sure).
And, how would someone have access to the RS scripts, its not like Jagex is gonna just give everybody a copy of there game script, that would probably be the dumbest thing they could possibly do.
[/quote]

they use java. they just run it on linux, and dont give it out. that would OWN if they did[/quote]

Hehe…if they did…theyd be broke

Read full topic
